name: Craft City Gangs Multiplayer
description:
Huge city to explore with multiplayer mode.

Get Through survival missions.

Different locations :

Hospital with doctor (buy medicines)
Prison with prisoners
Shops (you can buy food , Cars,Motobike)
Bank (you can deposit a money)
Airport (you can fly a boeing)
Car mechanic (repair or paint the car)
Fire Station (drive a car)
Disco and Casino (buy drinks or play casino games)
Scrap Heap (sell stolen cars)
Gym(you can exercice and increase speed)
House
Apartment with garage
Police Station
Seaport ( you can steer a ship)
Cinema
Army Base (steal a tank or copter)

15 kind of weapons including M16, tesla gun, katana, minigun,C4,Poison , Rocket launcher etc.
Different blocks, use to build houses

Many Different vehicles(sport cars,Hammer,Motobikes,Police cars,helicopter,tank)
Fly using Jetpack and shoot to robbers or cops.

Crafting will be available in next version
